title: Clash Team LF permanent members Top,Mid and Support
body:
Team Not Streamers

This team was founded by our two captains that have played on teams together for 5 years. We have multiple 1st and 2nd place finishes in tournaments and take the game seriously. Both are working professionals who love to compete and enjoy team focused play.

What We Are Looking For:

We are looking for equally reliable players who enjoy teamwork, improving and striving to win. Hopefully everyone can take criticism in a constructive way. We are not looking for players who baby rage, are going to quit after a couple losses, **players who don't want to listen to shot calls because they know it all**, and players who think because they are plat have challenger level skills (check the ego at the door). Reliability and a calm attitude are the assets we are most looking for. Must be able to attend most Clashes.

The Roles:

Please main the role you are applying for.


Why Should You Apply?

Reliable peope always looking to play

Competitive team environment

Tournament play

Not a meme team

Interested?

Please fill out the application below and I will contact you.  I will add suitable applicants for a tryout, if you do not get an add it just didn't look like a good fit for whatever reason.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdNYSvEzd4pvT_troCmIZI7OkoLMLftml1UDUujIO9I6LXuNw/viewform?usp=sf_link)]

replies.body: Do you have any rank requirements?
